item.title: More people are eating better products and being educated into going out of their way to get a better tasting chicken that has had a better life and been treated with respect.

item.title: how it was and how it is
item.description:
how it was and how it is

When I started cooking in the 70s the ultimate menus were made up of continental cuisine.
